segments.text: That's right . Once the contract with Stars.com is final , we'll deal with Zina .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't wait to see the expression on her face when we dump her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't jump the gun . She's in the driver's seat right now . You have to be patient .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . I'm patient , but vengeance will be mine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Settle down , Elvin . If you're not careful , you'll give our plan away . Zina's smart , you know .
segments.speaker: S1
